jp_raw: \m[clear](クローゼットの中には、危険そうな見た目のポーションがたくさんある。)
jp_clean: (クローゼットの中には、危険そうな見た目のポーションがたくさんある。)

en_raw: Was your roommate making bombs? Because with all the materials she has in here, it looks like she was learning how to make Craft bombs.
en_clean: Was your roommate making bombs? Because with all the materials she has in here, it looks like she was learning how to make Craft bombs.

アハハハ！

アハハ！

en_clean: I'm just saying. She has the materials to make a Craft bomb.

en_raw: How... do you know... how to make a Craft bomb...
en_clean: How... do you know... how to make a Craft bomb...

jp_clean: どうして... イザボーは... クラフト爆弾の作り方を知っているんだ...

en_clean: I-I learned it while I was studying to become a Defender... B-But isn't that just common knowledge???

jp_clean: おっ、俺は防衛隊になるための勉強をしてたときに、覚えたんだ... だ、だけど、一般的な知識だろ？？？

en_clean: I know I'm a kid and you'd think I DEFINITELY know how to make bombs, but I've never learned either.

ザーってば。

en_clean: We have to throw a bomb at the King.

en_clean: It would. What else do we need?
